name: pollen-puff
effect: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage. If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.
short_effect: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
